title: Dune: Part Two
summary: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

title: Oppenheimer
summary: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
summary: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds appear.

title: The Batman
summary: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption.

title: Tenet
summary: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage.

title: Soul
summary: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

title: Barbie
summary: Barbie suffers a crisis that leads her to question her world and her existence.

title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
summary: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes.

title: Poor Things
summary: The incredible tale about the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter.

title: Inside Out 2
summary: Follow Riley, in her teenage years, encountering new Emotions: Anxiety, Envy, Ennui and Embarrassment.
